testcase.classname: QA automation solution for below requirements
testcase.name: QA automation solution for Twitter Automation using BDD and Selenium
testcase.system-out: Given user opens twitter Login Page.........................................passed When user enters username and password and clicks on login button...........passed When Navigate profile page of logged user and upload a profile picture......passed Then user Update BIO field in profile section as Selenium Automation user...passed When user Update Location field in profile section as Houston, Texas........passed When user Update Website field in profile section as twitter.com............passed Then user Fetch BIO field ,location and website and check if the submit values got updated on the profile page.passed Then user Opens the twitter page of The Times of India and retrieve the tweets that were published in last 2 hrs.passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
